member.name: T:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice
member.summary: Invoice data structure

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.Receiver
member.summary: Structure representing the receiver

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.DateTimeIssued
member.summary: The date and time when the document was issued. Date and time cannot be in future.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.InternalId
member.summary: Internal document ID used to link back to the ERP document number. Value defined by the submitter.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.Currency
member.summary: Currency code used from ISO 4217.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.CurrencyRate
member.summary: Exchange rate of the Egyptian bank on the day of invoicing used to convert currency sold to the value of currency EGP. Mandatory if currencySold is not EGP.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.PurchaseOrderReference
member.summary: Optional: reference to purchase order that this document is related to.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.PurchaseOrderDescription
member.summary: Optional: Additional information about the purchase order provided to the recipient of the document.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.SalesOrderReference
member.summary: Optional: Reference to the previous sales order for informational purposes.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.SalesOrderDescription
member.summary: Optional: Additional information about the sales order provided to the recipient of the document.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.ProformaInvoiceNumber
member.summary: Optional: Reference to the previous proforma invoice.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.Payment
member.summary: Optional: Structure containing fields providing information on how payments needs to be made.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.Delivery
member.summary: Optional: Structure containing fields providing information on how the delivery of goods

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.ExtraDiscountAmount
member.summary: Additional discount amount applied at the level of the overall document, not individual lines.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Invoice.Lines
member.summary: Invoice lines of the invoice. Needs to have at least one invoice line.

member.name: T:MiddlewareLibraryCore.InvoiceLine
member.summary: Invoice lines of the invoice

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.InvoiceLine.InternalCode
member.summary: Internal code used for the product being sold

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.InvoiceLine.IsGs1
member.summary: True to use GS1 code, otherwise use GPC code, Must be false for this version

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.InvoiceLine.Description
member.summary: Description of the item being sold.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.InvoiceLine.Quantity
member.summary: Number of units of the defined unit type being sold. Number should be larger than 0.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.InvoiceLine.Amount
member.summary: Price of unit of goods/services sold

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.InvoiceLine.Unit
member.summary: Code of the unit type

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.InvoiceLine.ValueDifference
member.summary: Value difference when selling goods already taxed

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.InvoiceLine.Discount
member.summary: Optional: the structure defining the discount applied on a single unit sold.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.InvoiceLine.Taxes
member.summary: Array of taxes applied on a single unit sold.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.InvoiceLine.TaxesRate
member.summary: Array of taxes value applied on a single unit sold.

member.name: T:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver
member.summary: Representing the receiver information

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver.Country
member.summary: Country represented by ISO-3166-2 2 symbol code of the countries. Must be EG for internal business issuers.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver.Governate
member.summary: Governorate information as textual value

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver.RegionCity
member.summary: Region and city information as textual value

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver.Street
member.summary: street information

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver.BuildingNumber
member.summary: building information (number, name or both)

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver.PostalCode
member.summary: Optional: Postal code

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver.Floor
member.summary: Optional: the floor number

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver.Room
member.summary: Optional: the room/flat number in the floor

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver.Landmark
member.summary: Optional: nearest landmark to the address

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver.AdditionalInformation
member.summary: Optional: any additional information to the address

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver.Type
member.summary: Type of the issuer - supported values - B for business in Egypt, P for natural person, F for foreigner.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver.Id
member.summary: Registration number. For business in Egypt must be registration number. For residents must be national ID. For foreign buyers must be VAT ID of the foreign company. Optional if person buyer and invoice amount less than threshold limit defined. Receiver and issuer cannot be the same.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Receiver.Name
member.summary: Registration name of the company or name and surname of the person. Optional if person buyer and invoice amount less than threshold limit defined.

member.name: T:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Payment
member.summary: Structure containing fields providing information on how payments needs to be made.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Payment.BankName
member.summary: Optional: Name of the bank of document issuer.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Payment.BankAddress
member.summary: Optional: Address of the bank of document issuer. Captured as single line of text, not a structure.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Payment.BankAccountNo
member.summary: Optional: Local bank account number in the bank

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Payment.BankAccountIban
member.summary: Optional: International bank account number used primarily for international documents.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Payment.SwiftCode
member.summary: Optional: International Swift code of the bank.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Payment.Terms
member.summary: Optional: Description of the payment terms describing when and how payments needs to be made, for example.

member.name: T:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Delivery
member.summary: Structure containing fields providing information on how the delivery of goods

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Delivery.Approach
member.summary: Optional: Information on the approach for delivery used, means of transportation.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Delivery.Packaging
member.summary: Optional: Information on types of packages used when delivering the goods

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Delivery.DateValidity
member.summary: Optional: Validity date for exported products.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Delivery.ExportPort
member.summary: Optional: Port exporting the goods.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Delivery.CountryOfOrigin
member.summary: Optional: Country of origin of goods/services. Country represented by ISO-3166-2 2 symbol code of the countries.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Delivery.GrossWeight
member.summary: Optional: Total weight of the goods delivered. Value in kilograms.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Delivery.NetWeight
member.summary: Optional: Net weight of the goods delivered. Value in kilograms.

member.name: P:MiddlewareLibraryCore.Delivery.Terms
member.summary: Optional: Delivery terms/shipping terms information.

member.name: T:MiddlewareLibraryCore.DocumentRejectedModel
member.summary: List of documents that are not accepted together with their internal IDs and error information.

member.name: T:MiddlewareLibraryCore.ErrorResponseModel
member.summary: Error information detailing why the document was not accepted in this submission

member.name: T:MiddlewareLibraryCore.DocumentAcceptedModel
member.summary: List of documents that are accepted together with their internal IDs and newly assigned IDs.
